title: How to Win in RTW Custom Battle

steps.headline: With A Horse Army:Take Head on.

With Infantry:If playing open field, send your hoplites or spear men(if you have any, triarii are roman spearmen)in front and your light infantry at their rear.If you have 3 groups of horse men(excluding your general)hide them until you start to have heavy casualties.Hit them from rear or side.
steps.description: With ranged units let them stay distance from battle. If playing in a siege or being under siege, same thing.

steps.headline: With A Horse Army:If there are no spear men, take head on.
steps.description: If there are,round the enemy army and attack from rear or side.

steps.headline: With Infantry: If you have a lot of ranged units, wait for them to attack and send your missile units at head.When they come move your ranged to a safe attacking distance.

text: Against An Army of Horses With A Horse Army:Take Head on.  With Infantry:If playing open field, send your hoplites or spear men(if you have any, triarii are roman spearmen)in front and your light infantry at their rear.If you have 3 groups of horse men(excluding your general)hide them until you start to have heavy casualties.Hit them from rear or side. With ranged units let them stay distance from battle. If playing in a siege or being under siege, same thing. Against Infantry With A Horse Army:If there are no spear men, take head on. If there are,round the enemy army and attack from rear or side. With Infantry: If you have a lot of ranged units, wait for them to attack and send your missile units at head.When they come move your ranged to a safe attacking distance.
